content.modules: The following module(s) must migrate data:
content.wait: If the system is migrating its own data, please wait before starting

summary.title: Migration Summary
summary.nothing: No document needed to be migrated.

error.actors: An error occured while migrating data for world actors.
error.token: An error occured while migrating data for the token actor {uuid}.

addedHighlight.name: Highlight Added Items
addedHighlight.hint: Temporary "items" added by the module will be highlighted in the character and familiar sheets.

partyMembers.name: Party Members Only
partyMembers.hint: When a collection of players actors is retrieved in the module, should the module limits it to party members (if the character is member of any party) or all player owned actors?

customs.name: Custom Dailies
customs.hint: Register you own dailies with the module.
customs.label: Register

homebrew.name: Homebrew Settings
homebrew.hint: Add your custom stuff for the module to use in some of its dailies.
homebrew.label: Homebrew

error.incompatible: There are custom dailies that are incompatible with the current version of PF2e Dailies.
error.unexpected: An unexpected error occured with the module PF2e Dailies. See the console (F12) for details.

mind-weapon.title: Create Mind Weapon
mind-weapon.flavor:
This character doesn't have a mind weapon in their inventory.
Please select one of the following options to create one.
mind-weapon.label: A {hand} weapon that deals 1{die} damage{hasTrait}

message.changes: Has made the following changes during their daily preparations.
message.noChanges: Has made no changes during their daily preparations, you didn't even need to know about it really.

groups.spells: Is ready to use the spells
groups.ceremonial: Performed a ritual to create a ceremonial knife imbued with the spell
groups.staff: Has prepared a staff for the day
groups.blade: Imbued their spirit into their weapon
groups.mindsmith: Has focused their mind into their weapon

rations.used: Consumed one of their {name} and has {nb} remaining.
rations.almost: Consumed one of their {name} and only has {nb} remaining.

interface.title: {actor} - Daily Preparation
interface.noDailies: This character doesn't have any daily

tooltip.exists: This feat is already present on the character

notes.ace:
Choose a single spell from the arcane, divine, occult, or primal list of 4th level or lower.
The spell can't have a cost, nor can its casting time be more than 10 minutes. The spell must be able to target a single creature, and you must be a valid target for it.

error.wrongSource: Only compendium or world items can be used.
error.wrongData: The dropped item does not have the right {type} ({require}).
error.wrongTraits: The dropped item traits missmatch with the filter's.

migration.title: PF2e Dailies - Migration
migration.label: Read and Acknowledge
migration.reset: The daily selections saved on this character were not compatible with the current version of the module and have been reset.
migration.filter: You can now filter out dailies on a per-character basis, the option is directly available in the header of the preparation window (the original setting has been removed).

familiar.now-remove: The module doesn't indiscriminately remove familiar abilities anymore, it will now only remove those that were added by the module itself, making it possible to have more than the total number set on the sheet.
familiar.cant-remove: NOTE: Because of this, the module will not remove any old ability from the familiar, even if they were originally added by a previous version of the module.

staves.moved: You will now find your prepared staff in the Activations tab of the character sheet.

reset.title: Reset Staff Charges
reset.content: A re you sure you want to reset the staff charges to their maximum value (max: {max}) ?

error.notEnough: Cannot cast {spell} at {rank}: not enough charges.

spontaneous.title: Use Spontaneous slot
spontaneous.must: You must consume a spontaneous slot of {rank}{higher} from {from}?
spontaneous.would: Would you like to consume a spontaneous spell slot of {rank}{higher} from {from}?
spontaneous.multi: any of the following spellcasting entries

error.notEquipped: You need to equip your {staff} to use it.

delete.title: Delete Custom Daily
delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete this daily ?

code.error: The returned data isn't respecting the Daily structure.

readonly.flavor: This daily is flagged as read only because it was created in a previous version of the module and is incompatible. If you decide to unlock it, make sure to update it to the current version data format before saving.

homebrew.title: Homebrew Settings
homebrew.invalid: {entry} isn't the ID of a compendium pack nor the UUID of a {type}
homebrew.empty: You must provide a compendium pack ID or the UUID of a {type}
